${ModID}:StanceDance.NAME: Stance Dance
${ModID}:StanceDance.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Enter a random Stance. NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:StanceDance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Enter a random Stance.

${ModID}:RagnarokNRoll.NAME: Ragnarok 'n Roll
${ModID}:RagnarokNRoll.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Exit your Stance.

${ModID}:Serenity.NAME: Serenity
${ModID}:Serenity.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Enter ${ModID}:Serene.

${ModID}:Swagger.NAME: Swagger
${ModID}:Swagger.DESCRIPTION: If you end your turn in a Stance, 获得 !M! 点 力量 and Dexterity.
${ModID}:Swagger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有 。 NL If you end your turn in a Stance, 获得 !M! 点 力量 and Dexterity.

${ModID}:MoodSwing.NAME: Mood Swing
${ModID}:MoodSwing.DESCRIPTION: 抽 !M! 张牌。 NL Discard 2 cards. NL If you are in ${ModID}:Angry, enter Calm. Otherwise, enter ${ModID}:Angry.
